title: Reflective Writing
description: Personal reflection that connects experience with theory and future action.

milestones.name: Reflect
milestones.description: Capture the key experience, emotions, and lessons while they are fresh.

milestones.name: Write
milestones.description: Draft the reflection using a recognised structure such as Gibbs or DIEP.

milestones.name: Reflect on that writing
milestones.description: Step back to evaluate how well the draft links experience to concepts.

milestones.name: Write on that reflecting
milestones.description: Revise the response to deepen analysis and emphasise future actions.

milestones.name: Submit
milestones.description: Complete final edits for clarity, tone, and referencing before lodging.
